dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3348396F] Death threats and calls at 1:00am
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. ________________________________ From: Stefan [mailto:deepwolf@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2007 1:46 PM To: zzzzzz Subject: Re: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3348396F] Death threats and calls at 1:00am Thank you for the reply. The original image is honestly of little concern to me at this point. What does concern me is the thread I mentioned earlier that is a focus of the site at this point that exist purely to pass on my information along with misinformation for the purpose of continued harassment via phone, email, and other means that extend beyond the harassment that exists on the site. The harassment has still not yet stopped. I would like to know if there is a ticket number or some other number or agent assigned to my request so that I may have it for my records. I've been keeping a log of all my conversations and the people i've talked to with your company and I just would like to add it in. The email I recieved from you leads me to believe, and I apologize if i'm incorrect, that there is still some form of investigation going on. Thank you for your assistance, as I plan to pursue this untill my personal information is removed. On 3/7/07, zzzzzz wrote: To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto: abuse@ev1servers.net ] Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 7:13 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3348396F] Death threats and calls at 1:00am ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Death threats and calls at 1:00am Added by system at Tuesday, Mar 6 2007 01:09 am X-MailFrom: deepwolf@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67 ] by [ 216.12.192.78 ] (abacus) for ; Tue Mar 6 01:09:18 2007 Received: (qmail 18807 invoked by alias); 6 Mar 2007 07:09:18 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 18804 invoked from network); 6 Mar 2007 07:09:18 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111 ) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 6 Mar 2007 07:09:18 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([ 216.185.111.52 ]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC( 6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 6 Mar 2007 01:09:17 -0600 Return-path: < deepwolf@gmail.com > Delivery-date: Tue, 06 Mar 2007 01:09:17 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181 ] helo= mx02.filter.theplanet.com ) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from deepwolf@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HOTnR-00044l-HN for abuse@theplanet.com ; Tue, 06 Mar 2007 01:09:17 -0600 Received: from nf-out-0910.google.com ([ 64.233.182.186 ]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from deepwolf@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HOTnR-0002U1-5R for abuse@theplanet.com ; Tue, 06 Mar 2007 01:09:17 -0600 Received: by nf-out-0910.google.com with SMTP id b2so2218053nfe for ; Mon, 05 Mar 2007 23:09:15 -0800 (PST) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com ; s=beta; h=domainkey-signature:received:received:message-id:date:from:to:subject: mime-version:content-type; b=PaSp0edF9sL4nCEj8ahrF9l6qfyNJCMQ3GFeDoDJvN2ytm+ZoHZu0ecnaXEq4Ge0q7BnTv PnlbH/3ltFI/AOMfUy3VFQh+oxvEmEOjQEe2jlnAbW4WZPaW6tdRHx2NrUyAVJYBQwSRa3G3 3sOMxbwunucQw2DWAqxucnotJvnTY= DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com ; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=sV3+2kM0Zu/X+y3qYfMSctSVADhh9u5Oz9zvnN9xxOLb8ariundau/9CCG6HOU66V46pXb PqjZCH7/RyWQ061Si8k64FtPbh4hGg1VRXQnqJe8C7FvnBRzUH9ZSWFbFhq5zAqz8UQl2U0t NEE503Uhs5WMh6jQYatcWEpUd/d8o= Received: by 10.82.114.3 with SMTP id m3mr6376050buc.1173164954931; Mon, 05 Mar 2007 23:09:14 -0800 (PST) Received: by 10.82.120.10 with HTTP; Mon, 5 Mar 2007 23:09:14 -0800 (PST) Message-ID: < 9ebc25af0703052309v7ef17ccbp94058582a2a21b70@mail.gmail.com > Date: Tue, 6 Mar 2007 02:09:14 -0500 From: Stefan < deepwolf@gmail.com > To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Death threats and calls at 1:00am MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_72559_22553232.1173164954850" Received-SPF: pass ( mx02.filter.theplanet.com : domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.182.186 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.182.186 ; envelope-from= deepwolf@gmail.com; helo=nf-out-0910.google.com ; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 Mar 2007 07:09:17.0798 (UTC) FILETIME=[5AF81060:01C75FBE] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello, I just got off the phone with David at your support desk and he was very nice and refered me over to you guys. I'm emailing you about the site www.ufck.org which is a forum site. Specifically, it's in relation to a post at http://www.ufck.org/forums/showthread.php?t=208511 Due to this site, which is now shareing personal contact information and photographs of myself... I have become the target of a especially angry mob of people who have been harrassing me for a while. I'll give you a little backstory. I was notified a few weeks prior that many copywritten photos were posted to this site and I was in one of them. I sent a polite generic email to the site's admin requesting it be removed and I never recieved a response. This evening, I started reciving emails, phone calls, and threats from members of the site and i'm starting to become rather upset. I revisited the site and have now found a large post of personal information, my original email to the site owner, and more photographs of myself along with various forms of harrasment and accusations of writing stories involving pedophilia and incest. I have not attempted further contact with the site admin, but as he is taking part in the harrasment, I feel it would be unwise. I'm not sure how someone got my phone number, but I know it is not on the internet. This leads me to believe that someone on this site may possibly know me, and if this is the case the death threats are being taken seriously. I am not sure what I can do to stop this, as I feel that anything done may only cause this to escalate, and I have never been involved with anything of this nature before. I'm just a mature carrer tech guy who has to go to work tomorrow... and the phone calls and continued harrasment are keeping me up and scaring my girlfriend. From what I understand, a fair bit of what goes on on this site is benign, what is happening to me now isn't... and after experiencing the standard response to a polite inquiry to remove a photo and looking at the site, I would be shocked if I was the first complaint. Please contact me as soon as possible preferably via my cell phone number which is 614-370-8592 I fully expect further phone calls and harrasment through the night and am on the brink of calling the Columbus PD. Please let me know what my options are and thank you so much for your time and let me know how I might be able to get David from your support desk some recognition for listening to me ramble on the phone about this and being so polite and helpfull. -Stefan LaVigne MIME element (text/html)
Hello,
 
I just got off the phone with David at your support desk and he was very nice and refered me over to you guys. I'm emailing you about the site www.ufck.org which is a forum site. Specifically, it's in relation to a post at http://www.ufc k.org/forums/showthread.php?t=208511 
 
Due to this site, which is now shareing personal contact information and photographs of myself... I have become the target of a especially angry mob of people who have been harrassing me for a while.
 
I'll give you a little backstory.
 
I was notified a few weeks prior that many copywritten photos were posted to this site and I was in one of them. I sent a polite generic email to the site's admin requesting it be removed and I never recieved a response. This evening, I started reciving emails, phone calls, and threats from members of the site and i'm starting to become rather upset. I revisited the site and have now found a large post of personal information, my original email to the site owner, and more photographs of myself along with various forms of harrasment and accusations of writing stories involving pedophilia and incest. I have not attempted further contact with the site admin, but as he is taking part in the harrasment, I feel it would be unwise. I'm not sure how someone got my phone number, but I know it is not on the internet. This leads me to believe that someone on this site may possibly know me, and if this is the case the death threats are being taken seriously.
 
I am not sure what I can do to stop this, as I feel that anything done may only cause this to escalate, and I have never been involved with anything of this nature before.
 
I'm just a mature carrer tech guy who has to go to work tomorrow... and the phone calls and continued harrasment are keeping me up and scaring my girlfriend.
 
From what I understand, a fair bit of what goes on on this site is benign, what is happening to me now isn't... and after experiencing the standard response to a polite inquiry to remove a photo and looking at the site, I would be shocked if I was the first complaint.
 
Please contact me as soon as possible preferably via my cell phone number which is 614-370-8592
 
I fully expect further phone calls and harrasment through the night and am on the brink of calling the Columbus PD.
 
Please let me know what my options are and thank you so much for your time and let me know how I might be able to get David from your support desk some recognition for listening to me ramble on the phone about this and being so polite and helpfull.
 
-Stefan LaVigne
 
 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
